Summary: FROM THE ROAD ABOVE THE TREES.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Front Royal
There were no other sightings in Front Royal on or around July 24th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsAcoss the road from the store biglots we my Father and Mother and myself in the car going by the store when cars stoped in the road as people looked up we all saw a egg disc gray with jets right behind the disc. the disc stoped in mid air for what was like hours but I say no more then 30 secs. Then just as the jets were right on the disc it shot right up into the sky it was so fast it took less then a sec to shot up I say. Befor this day me and my parnets have seen this befor the 1st time was in the mid 90s we were going to K.Y. Then the 2nd time was in 2000 right after the big ice storm in Maine.
